source_sentence: 順正理論(八十卷一千四百二十紙)唐永徽年玄奘譯顯宗論(四十卷六百四十四紙)唐永徽年玄奘譯發智論(二十卷三百六十四紙)唐永徽年玄奘譯右一論與舊迦延八犍度三十卷同。
translation: The Shunshōri lun (80 volumes, 1,420 pages) was translated by Xuanzang in the year of Yonghui of the Tang Dynasty into the Xianzong lun (40 volumes, 644 pages), and the Fazhi lun (20 volumes, 364 pages) was translated by Xuanzang in the year of Yonghui of the Tang Dynasty into the same 30 volumes as the old Kātyāyana bhāgandu.

source_sentence: 俱舍論(三十卷四百七十紙)唐顯慶年玄奘譯右一論。
translation: Kushya lun (30 volumes, 470 pages) Xuanzang translated the right one in the Tang Dynasty in the year of Xianqing.

source_sentence: 與真諦所出二十二卷同。
translation: It's the same as the twenty-two volumes produced by the true truth.

translation: In the year of Xuanzang's revelation, in the former Qín Dynasty, Soma Bhagavān translated the Exodus Treatise (20 volumes, 487 pages) at Chang'an. In the former Qín Dynasty, Zhu Fonian translated the Chengshi lun (4 volumes, 400 pages, 20 volumes, or 10) at Chang'an.
The Śākya family of Zhongnanshan.

source_sentence: 於京師西明寺撰依前錄有外道金七十論。
translation: At the Ximing Temple in Beijing, he compiled the preceding record of scriptures, which contains seventy treatises on the non-Buddhist jin.
The four non-Buddhist doctrines are refuted.

source_sentence: 破外道涅槃論未睱故闕。
translation: The Treatise on the Refutation of Non-Buddhist Nirvana is missing because it's not yet available.

source_sentence: 都合大小乘經律論并賢聖集合四萬六千八百五十紙。
translation: It combines the major and minor vehicle scriptures, vinaya treatises, and the Bhadrayānīya-sūtra collection of 46,850 pages.
